segments.text: Hello . May I speak to Jerry , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , but he is out for lunch right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Can you give me some idea how long he'll be back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think he will be back around 2:00 . If you like , please leave your name and phone number , I'll have him call you as soon as he comes back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's nice . My name is Steven , my phone number is 6789777 . Okay , I'll be waiting for his call . Thank you and bye !
segments.speaker: S1
